notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Funding for this work was provided by the livestock industries through the Cattle Council of Australia, Australian Dairy Farmers, Australian Lot Feeders Association, Wool Producers Australia, Sheepmeat Council of Australia, Australian Pork Limited and the Goat Industry Council of Australia through the Meat and Livestock Australia Donor Company matching arrangements with the Australian Government (FMD Risk Management Project P.PSH 0558 and P.PSH.0652). Animal Health Australia provided the project management service for all relevant industries. Funding was also provided by the Ministry of Agriculture, Nature and Food Quality, the Netherlands (project WOT-01-003-011).
